title: Realms of the Gods
description: Realms of the Gods  Tae Rames thinks her life is now made. She has done the impossible. She has survived the Island and freed Loki from his prison. In return she is offered a prime position on his staff; all her sacrifices have seemed to pay off. Unknown to Tae though, enemies far more powerful than she has so far faced have surfaced. Each one of them, determined to destroy the young Terran girl for her actions. Follow Tae as she is once again thrust headfirst into the machinations of the Gods and their followers, some of which seek a terrible revenge of their own against her. And hidden in an impenetrable Nebula, forgotten by everyone, a powerful ancient consciousness, almost as old as the Gods themselves, begins to stir. It has waited, and watched. Finally, its time has come.
author: C.M.  Kane
